channel.title: Compiler
channel.description: since no1 awnsers on compiler topic i make here a topic ,,i got a problem with compiler :s , when i try like to add and npc i go autospawn i add him then i logout server i try to compile it and it says can't find given pad exeption in thread main java lang numberformatexpetion:for input tring " then comes what npc i wanted to add the code.. then all those at with java stuff after at................................. at................................ at............................... at................................ at................................ tried to set classpath and path again still doesn't work any helps :s?

item.title: Compiler
item.dc:creator: @Eson Eson
item.description:
@Eson wrote:

[quote=“Jonnydpickle, post:10, topic:321176”]paste what it says when you click run and tell me what you edited[/quote]since no1 awnsers on compiler topic i make here a topic ,i got a problem with compiler :s , when i try like to add and npc i go autospawn i add him then i logout server i try to compile it and it says can’t find given pad exeption in thread main java lang numberformatexpetion:for input tring " then comes what npc i wanted to add the code… then all those at with java stuff after at…
at…
at…
at…
at…
tried to set classpath and path again still doesn’t work any helps :s? this when i tried to add npc ,

i used tabs it still says =exeption in thread "main java.langarray indexoutofbounds:6-transscapev1
at npchandler load autospawn (npc handler.java :2508)
at NPChandler <npchandler.java: 24

this when i used tabs… i only editted at autospawn trued to add a npc and at npchandler java i tried to let an npc say somthing else but i couldn’t compile…

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler
item.dc:creator: @Eson Eson
item.description:
@Eson wrote:

[quote=“Jonnydpickle, post:8, topic:321176”]You didnt use tabs watch

spawn(space) =(space)#(tab)###(tab)###(tab)0(tab)0(tab)0(tab)0(tab)0(tab)1[/quote]already tried like that. not the problem…

Read full topic

at…
tried to set classpath and path again still doesn’t work any helps :s?

make sure you use tabs, not spaces.

at npchandler load autospawn (npc handler.java :2508)

what did you change, you obviously did something
